_comment_priority: Priority order: Specific gates > Gate ranges > Wildcards

_comment_examples.specific: B3 will always be JBU (overrides B1-B11 range)
_comment_examples.range: B1-B11 assigns AAL to gates B1, B2, B4-B11 (B3 excluded by specific)
_comment_examples.wildcard: B# handles any B gates not covered by specific or range assignments
_comment_examples.multiple_airlines: E# randomly selects from ASA, ACA, or UAL for E gates
